content.query:
Create table modelo_transacciones.Fact_Transacciones (
    Key_Transacciones bigint identity(1,1) not null,
    Key_Date bigint not null,
    Cliente_Key bigint not null,
    Producto_Key bigint not null,
    DescripcionTransaccion varchar(100) not null,
    ValorTransaccion float not null,
    ValorUnidades float null,
    TasaPactada float null,
    TasaFacturada float null,
    CargosYAbonos float null,
    SaldoADiferir float null,
    Cuotas varchar(5)
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH (Cliente_Key),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
